bike.description: C-7 Monocoque High Modulus carbon with UD-Marble finish, Integrated aluminum cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: C-7 High Modulus carbon stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, cold forged dropout with replaceable hanger
